segments.text: So , did you go out with Richard ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . We went to a movie last Saturday . We saw Police Partners II .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Richard did , but I didn't . Of course , I told him I liked it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . So did you do anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we went to a dance club .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , we had a great time . And we're going to go there again next week !
segments.speaker: S2
